title: Why MVC is so important
content: MVC allows developers to maintain a true separation of concerns, devising their code between the Model layer for data, the View layer for design, and the Controller layer for application logic.

title: Authentication vs. Authorization
content: Authentication is the process of verifying who you really are. Authorization is the process of verifying what you can do with your data.

title: What is ORM?
content: An ORM is a software tool that allows developers to work with relational databases in an object-oriented fashion.
